comments:
Exception creating new launch configuration.

Reason: No such file or directory generating launch configuration XML.

NullPointerException at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.launcher.JavaMainTab.performApply(JavaMainTab.java:184)
Please provide steps to reproduce, and Eclipse version number.

Version 2.0 Build 20020416

Steps to reproduce:
1. Start Eclipse
2. Create project
3. Create package
4. Write "Hello World" file
5. Push "Run" button
6. Choose "Java Application" in Launch configurations wizard
7. Push "New"
!!! Error message as reported
8. Push OK
9. Back in Launch conf wizard type in a name
10. Push Apply
!!!Internal error message
11. Push Details
12. NullPointerException as reported

Where is your workspace located? In the local file system?

My one and only workspace is located in the local filesystem
/usr/java/eclipse/workspace .I am the owner of the eclipse directory and its
subdirectories. I did not specify another workspace with the corresponding
option when starting eclipse.
